answers.answer: Hi there!A sugar level of 74 is fine. Slightly increased fluid intake/ urination may not be abnormal in children; besides, increased thirst and urination can also be caused due to dehydration, infections, etc. However since you describe an increased colour and odour, you may like to get this evaluated by her pediatrician for an accurate diagnosis and appropriate management, if required.Hope this helps.Take care!

question: my husband is a diabetic since age 12 we have a 15 month old daughter. she drinks i guess alot but pees frequently alot of time with strong odor n brite color...everynow n then she when sleeping besides me will sweat i did just check her sugar n it wuz 74 i am gonna check a few more times today n then call my pediatrition
title: childhood diabetes
